Text:
Bedankt Koedje, lijkt me heel apart.
Alleen droomde ik ervan dat het linkje naar moviemeter anders moest zijn, zoiets: http://www.moviemeter.nl/film/86041

Excellent video and audio until about 30 minutes in when the file becomes corrupt and wont play. I am using VLC Player and never had a problem before.
Either my download became corrupt or there IS a problem with this rip.
BTW the first 30 minutes although great quality it was a crappy film anyway and I probably would have given up on it anyway. Divine intervention perhaps? lol
